mapper.select: select * from user where AUTHORITY = 0 order by regDate DESC limit #{offset}, #{cntPerPage}
select * from notice order by noticeID DESC limit #{offset}, #{cntPerPage}
insert into notice(title, content, regDate, writerID) values( #{title}, #{content}, current_timestamp, #{writerID} )
update notice set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, modDate = current_timestamp where noticeID = #{noticeID}
select * from notice where noticeID = (select MIN(noticeID) from notice where noticeID > #{noticeID})
select * from notice where noticeID = (select MAX(noticeID) from notice where noticeID < #{noticeID})
select * from product order by productID DESC
insert into product(name, price, description, size, imageUrl) values( #{name}, #{price}, #{description}, #{size}, #{imageUrl})
